00026 
00027         static bool is_sep(char c)
00028         {
00029                 const char* seps = path::separators();
00030                 while(*seps)
00031                 {
00032                         if(c == *seps) return true;
00033                         ++seps;
00034                 }
00035                 return false;
00036         }
00037 
00039 
00040         bool pathcmp(const char* s1, const char* s2)
00041         {
00042                 for(; *s1 && *s2; ++s1, ++s2)
00043                 {
00044                         if(*s1 != *s2
00045                                 && !(is_sep(*s1) && is_sep(*s2))
00046 #if defined OS_WINDOWS
00047                                 && (tolower(*s1) != tolower(*s2))
00048 #endif
00049                                 )
00050                                 return false;
00051                 }
00052                 return *s1 == '\0' && *s2 == '\0';
00053         }

00056         // path impl
00058 
00059         struct path::path_impl
00060         {
00062 
00063                 path_impl() 
00064                 { }
00065 
00067 
00068                 path_impl(const char* p)
00069                 {
00070                         for(const char* pp = p; *pp; ++pp)
00071                                 if(is_bad_path_symbol(*pp))
00072                                         throw module::InvalidArgumentException("Invalid symbols in the path");
00073 
00074                         size_t l = strlen(p);
00075                         while(l-- > 1 && is_sep(p[l]))
00076                                 ;
00077 
00078                         str.assign(p, l + 1);
00079                 }
00080 
00082 
00083                 path_impl(const path_impl& other)
00084                         : str(other.str)
00085                 { }
00086 
00088 
00089                 path_impl& operator=(const path_impl& rhs)
00090                 {
00091                         if(this == &rhs)
00092                                 return *this;
00093 
00094                         str = rhs.str;
00095                         return *this;
00096                 }
00097 
00099 
00100                 path_impl& operator+=(const path_impl& rhs)
00101                 {
00102                         if(!rhs.str.empty())
00103                         {
00104                                 size_t size = str.size();
00105 
00106                                 const char* as = rhs.str.c_str();
00107                                 
00108                                 if(size) // skip as a trick for unix root paths
00109                                         while(*as && is_sep(*as))
00110                                                 ++as;
00111 
00112                                 if(size && *as && !is_sep(str[size - 1]))
00113                                         str += *path::separators();
00114 
00115                                 str.append(as);
00116                         }
00117                         return *this;
00118                 }
00119 
00121 
00122                 bool operator==(const path_impl& rhs) const
00123                 {
00124                         return pathcmp(str.c_str(), rhs.str.c_str());
00125                 }
00126 
00128 
00129                 bool operator!=(const path_impl& rhs) const
00130                 {
00131                         return ! (*this == rhs );
00132                 }
00133 
00135 
00136                 std::string str;
00137         };

00159 
00160         path::path(const iterator& begin, const iterator& end)
00161                 : m_impl(new path_impl())
00162         {
00163                 stack_string<> tmp = "";
00164                 bool first = true;
00165                 for(iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
00166                 {
00167                         if(!first && !is_sep((*tmp)[tmp->size()-1]))
00168                                 *tmp += *separators();
00169                         *tmp += it.element();
00170                         first = false;
00171                 }
00172                 m_impl->str = tmp->c_str();
00173         }

00281 
00282         const char* path::extension() const
00283         {
00284                 stack_string<10> sep(separators());
00285                 *sep += '.';
00286                 size_t i = m_impl->str.find_last_of(sep->c_str());
00287                 
00288                 if(i == std::string::npos || m_impl->str[i] != '.')
00289                         return "";
00290 
00291                 return &m_impl->str.c_str()[i];
00292         }

00296         void path::absolute()
00297         {
00298                 char buf[512];
00299 
00300                 DWORD len = ::GetFullPathNameA(m_impl->str.c_str(), sizeof(buf), buf, 0);
00301                 if(len < sizeof(buf))
00302                 {
00303                         *this = path(len ? buf : "");
00304                         return;
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 std::vector<char> vec;
00308                 vec.resize(len + 1);
00309                 ::GetFullPathNameA(m_impl->str.c_str(), len + 1, &vec[0], 0);
00310 
00311                 *this = path(&vec[0]);
00312         }

00322 
00323         void path::relative(const path& dir)
00324         {
00325                 if(!is_absolute() || !dir.is_absolute())
00326                         return;
00327 
00328                 path tmp;
00329 
00330                 path prefix = common_prefix(*this, dir);
00331 
00332                 if(prefix.size() == dir.size())
00333                 {
00334                         slice(iterator(*this, prefix.size() + 1), end());
00335                         return;
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 for(iterator it(dir, prefix.size() + 1), e = dir.end(); it != e; ++it)
00339                         tmp += "..";
00340 
00341                 for(iterator it(*this, prefix.size() + 1), e = end(); it != e; ++it)
00342                         tmp += it.element();
00343 
00344                 std::swap(m_impl->str, tmp.m_impl->str);
00345         }

00349         void path::normcase()
00350         {
00351                 std::transform(m_impl->str.begin(), m_impl->str.end(), m_impl->str.begin(), tolower);
00352         }

00355 
00356         void path::normpath()
00357         {
00358                 path tmp;
00359                 const char sep[2] = { *separators(), '\0' };
00360 
00361                 for(iterator it = begin(), e = end(); it != e; ++it)
00362                 {
00363                         if(strcmp(it.element(), "..") != 0 || tmp.empty())
00364                         {
00365                                 tmp += it.element();
00366                                 tmp += sep;
00367                         }       
00368                         else
00369                                 --tmp;
00370                 }
00371                 std::swap(this->m_impl->str, tmp.m_impl->str);
00372         }

00392         void path::slice(const iterator& begin, const iterator& end)
00393         {
00394                 stack_string<> tmp = "";
00395                 bool first = true;
00396                 for(iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
00397                 {
00398                         if(!first && !is_sep((*tmp)[tmp->size()-1]))
00399                                 *tmp += *separators();
00400                         *tmp += it.element();
00401                         first = false;
00402                 }
00403                 m_impl->str = tmp->c_str();
00404         }

00415         bool path::is_absolute() const
00416         {
00417 #if defined OS_WINDOWS
00418                 return m_impl->str.length() > 1 && m_impl->str[1] == ':';
00419 #elif defined OS_LINUX
00420                 return !m_impl->str.empty() && m_impl->str[0] == '/';
00421 #endif
00422         }

00446 
00447         int path::get_attributes() const
00448         {
00449                 DWORD attrs = ::GetFileAttributesA(m_impl->str.c_str());
00450                 if(attrs == 0xffffffff)
00451                 {
00452                         DWORD ec = ::GetLastError();
00453                         if(ec == ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
00454                                 || ec == ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND
00455                                 || ec == ERROR_INVALID_NAME
00456                                 || ec == ERROR_INVALID_DRIVE
00457                                 || ec == ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER
00458                                 || ec == ERROR_BAD_PATHNAME
00459                                 || ec == ERROR_BAD_NETPATH)
00460                         {
00461                                 return fa_not_found;
00462                         }
00463                         return fa_unknown;
00464                 }
00465                 int ret = (attrs & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY) ? fa_directory : fa_file;
00466                 if(attrs & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_HIDDEN) ret |= fa_hidden;
00467                 if(attrs & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_READONLY) ret |= fa_readonly;
00468                 return ret;
00469         }

00487         bool path::is_bad_filename_symbol(char c)
00488         {
00489                 unsigned char code = (unsigned char)c;
00490                 return code < 32 || c == '"' || c == '<' || c == '>' || c == '|' 
00491                          || c == ':' || c == '*' || c == '?' || c == '\\' || c == '/' ;
00492         }

00495 
00496         bool path::is_bad_path_symbol(char c)
00497         {
00498                 unsigned char code = (unsigned char)c;
00499                 return code < 32 || c == '"' || c == '<' || c == '>' || c == '|';
00500         }

00504         path path::common_prefix(const path& p1, const path& p2)
00505         {
00506                 iterator it1 = p1.begin(), e1 = p1.end();
00507                 iterator it2 = p2.begin(), e2 = p2.end();
00508 
00509                 for(; it1 != e1 
00510                         && it2 != e2 
00511                         && pathcmp(it1.element(), it2.element());
00512                 ++it1, ++it2)
00513                         ;
00514                 return path(p1.begin(), it1);
00515         }

00519         path path::current_dir()
00520         {
00521                 char buf[512];
00522                 DWORD len = ::GetCurrentDirectoryA(sizeof(buf), buf);
00523                 if(len < sizeof(buf))
00524                         return path(len ? buf : "");
00525 
00526                 std::vector<char> vec;
00527                 vec.resize(len + 1);
00528                 ::GetCurrentDirectoryA(len + 1, &vec[0]);
00529 
00530                 return path(&vec[0]);
00531         }

00544         path path::temp_file_name(const path& p, const char* prefix)
00545         {
00546                 char buf[_MAX_PATH];
00547                 ::GetTempFileNameA(p.c_str(), prefix, 0, buf);
00548                 return path(buf);

00577 
00578         struct path::iterator::iterator_impl
00579         {
00580 
00582 
00583                 iterator_impl(const path& parent, size_t position)
00584                         : p(&parent)
00585                         , pos(position)
00586                         , pstr(&parent.m_impl->str)
00587                 {
00588                         set_element(pos);
00589                 }
00590 
00592 
00593                 iterator_impl(const iterator_impl& other)
00594                         : p(other.p)
00595                         , pos(other.pos)
00596                         , pstr(other.pstr)
00597                         , element(other.element)
00598                 { }
00599 
00601 
00602                 iterator_impl& operator=(const iterator_impl& rhs)
00603                 {
00604                         if(this == &rhs)
00605                                 return *this;
00606 
00607                         p = rhs.p;
00608                         pos = rhs.pos;
00609                         pstr = rhs.pstr;
00610                         element = rhs.element;
00611                         return *this;
00612                 }
00613 
00615 
00616                 iterator_impl& operator++()
00617                 {
00618                         assert(pstr->c_str()[pos]);
00619                         pos += element.size();
00620                         pos = skip_seps(pos);
00621                         set_element(pos);
00622                         return *this;
00623                 }
00624 
00626 
00627                 iterator_impl operator++(int)
00628                 {
00629                         iterator_impl ret(*this);
00630                         ++*this;
00631                         return ret;
00632                 }
00633 
00635 
00636                 iterator_impl& operator--()
00637                 {
00638                         size_t np = rskip_seps(pos);
00639                         np = rnext_sep(np);
00640                         assert(np != pos);
00641                         pos = np;
00642                         set_element(np);
00643                         return *this;
00644                 }
00645 
00647 
00648                 iterator_impl operator--(int)
00649                 {
00650                         iterator_impl ret(*this);
00651                         --*this;
00652                         return ret;
00653                 }
00654 
00656 
00657                 operator bool() const
00658                 {
00659                         return pos != pstr->size();
00660                 }
00661 
00663 
00664                 bool operator==(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00665                 {
00666                         assert(rhs.p == p);
00667                         return pos == rhs.pos;
00668                 }
00669 
00671 
00672                 bool operator!=(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00673                 {
00674                         return !(*this == rhs);
00675                 }
00676 
00678 
00679                 bool operator<(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00680                 {
00681                         assert(rhs.p == p);
00682                         return pos < rhs.pos;
00683                 }
00684 
00686 
00687                 bool operator<=(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00688                 {
00689                         assert(rhs.p == p);
00690                         return pos <= rhs.pos;
00691                 }
00692 
00694 
00695                 bool operator>(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00696                 {
00697                         assert(rhs.p == p);
00698                         return pos > rhs.pos;
00699                 }
00700 
00702 
00703                 bool operator>=(const iterator_impl& rhs) const
00704                 {
00705                         assert(rhs.p == p);
00706                         return pos >= rhs.pos;
00707                 }
00708 
00710 
00711                 void set_element(size_t start)
00712                 {
00713                         element.clear();
00714                         size_t end = next_sep(start);
00715                         if(start != end)
00716                                 element.assign(&(*pstr)[start], end - start);
00717                         else if(!start && !pstr->empty())
00718                                 element += *path::separators();
00719                 }
00720 
00722 
00723                 size_t skip_seps(size_t _p) const
00724                 {
00725                         const char* s = pstr->c_str();
00726                         while( s[_p] && is_sep(s[_p]) )
00727                                 ++_p;
00728                         return _p;
00729                 }
00730 
00731                 size_t rskip_seps(size_t _p) const
00732                 {
00733                         const char* s = pstr->c_str();
00734                         while (_p-- && is_sep(s[_p]))
00735                                 ;
00736                         return _p + 1;
00737                 }
00738 
00740 
00741                 size_t next_sep(size_t _p) const
00742                 {
00743                         const char* s = pstr->c_str();
00744                         while( s[_p] && !is_sep(s[_p]) )
00745                                 ++_p;
00746                         return _p;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 size_t rnext_sep(size_t _p) const
00750                 {
00751                         const char* s = pstr->c_str();
00752                         while (_p-- && !is_sep(s[_p]))
00753                                 ;
00754                         return _p + 1;
00755                 }
00756 
00758 
00759                 std::string element;
00760                 const path* p;
00761                 std::string* pstr;
00762                 size_t pos;
00763         };
00764
